resources.string: Math Blitz is exactly what it’s name suggests. A quick, fun way to play math!
As soon as the gameplay begins, you will be prompted with a math problem to solve. Once done, you can hit enter.
Your goal is to solve these problems quickly and correctly! They get tougher as you go along! The game ends when you give 3 wrong answers. See if you can make it to the revered BLACK Pencil!
But be quick!, You’ll have only 7 seconds to solve it! Too many misses and you shall NOT Pass!
Based on the high score and your performance in the game, you currently own a YELLOW pencil!
Try getting to the next level, which is… Well we don\'t know! You find out!
We\'ll update your pencil status when you make it ! Keep playing math!
